descriptionHtml:
[list]
[*]SORRY for my poor English,

[/list][center][size=5]
[/size][size=3]  [b]this MOD[/b] modle a new blade armor to the [b]Skyrim[/b],
[/size][size=2]
I really like[/size][u][b]Ark's[/b] Rogue Blade Armor[/u][size=4]---[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84409/?][size=4][/size][/url][size=4][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84409/?]his mod site[/url][size=4]
[/size](his blade Cuirass quite lorely to [b]Oblivion-[/b]edition，but the ironpants look a little odd i think...)
[quote][/quote]

[/center][left]
[size=3]Contains
[/size][size=2]new dragonscale-pants  armor,(Retextures more lore-friendly) [/size][/left][center]a dragon-skin-frontarm Sleeve 
(it will NOT overwrite your Gauntlets position，you can wear them both！)
a  new [u]iron-gloves [/u]to this MOD.
[/center][center]


[size=2]For now,I ONLY WORK the [b][u]MALE version[/u][/b]，sorry for Female Character，maybe some time  I will finish it.[/size][/center]
[size=5]

[quote][/quote][center]HOPE YOU LIKE IT!![/center][/size]
author: KnightBBpig
